Articles.Content:
Currently, Kerbals on EVA can repack parachutes, repair busted wheels, pickup science, and a handful of other small tasks. It would be nice if the EVA system could be expanded to include installation of certain parts (struts).

A good use case would be while building a space station. Separately launched parts that are installed via docking ports can frequently benefit from the installation of struts between these separate parts. The perfect task for a Kerbal with a screwdriver and an EVA strut kit.

Other parts that would be feasible for a Kerbal to manually un/install/replace on EVA:

- Lights

- Solar Panels (Small)

- Antennas

- Sensors

-Ximok
Basicly, you want Kerbal Attatchment System
I`d support a limited KAS being stock. It would be very handy.
